body: Nice how they’re two different women
I've seen this pop up for like 6 times
Damn this is getting re-uploaded every single day

At first i thought the widow at the last page was the same woman from before, but when i saw her mole i was like "Yeah this is what i want, indeed this is truly a happy ending i need"

Man I'm glad she keeps her promise for not having anymore affairs, and I'm glad i didn't fap to a slut widow whose willing to have an affair as long as her libido is satisfied lol. Overral this is good quality doujin with reasonable characters in it, especially the mc, he doesn't took things way too far as he knows the limit, and the mom... Well she's also being a reasonable character since she didn't left her daughter despite having an affair
